greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of ways to place n nonattacking nightriders on an n X n toroidal board.
comment: A nightrider is a fairy chess piece that can move (proportionate to how a knight moves) in any direction.
link: V. Kotesovec, Number of ways of placing non-attacking queens, kings, bishops and knights (in English and Czech)
results.author: _Vaclav Kotesovec_, May 10 2011
